markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 14+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ouroboros Flail](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1069)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 187 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [War Flail](/Weapons.aspx?ID=46)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

You can easily expand and contract the chain of this _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [extending](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1055) [war flail](/Weapons.aspx?ID=46)_. It magically grows new links when extended and loses them when contracted.

<document level="2" id="action-859" />

<document level="2" id="action-860" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 14"
pfs="Standard"
>
Ouroboros Flail
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 187 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 4,400 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 2

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 17"
pfs="Standard"
>
Ouroboros Flail (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 187 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 15,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 2

</row>

</column>

---

The flail is a _+3 greater striking greater extending war flail_, the activation's DC is 37, and the severed chain is 120 feet long.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 20"
pfs="Standard"
>
Ouroboros Flail (Major)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 187 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 65,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 2

</row>

</column>

---

The flail is a _+3 major striking greater extending war flail_, the activation's DC is 43, and the severed chain is 120 feet long.
name: Ouroboros Flail (Greater)
